auth.form.reset-password.email-prompt: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.form.reset-password.email-sent: An email has been sent to you with instructions on how to reset your password, please check your inbox and click the link provided.
auth.form.reset-password.success: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now login with your new password.
auth.register.success.title: Thank you for registering! We've sent a verification email to the address you provided. Please check your email and click on the verification link to activate your account.
auth.register.success.description: If you haven't received the email, please check your spam folder. You can also click the button below to resend the email.
auth.verify-email.retry-title: If you haven't received the email, please try again now.
auth.verify-email.retry-description: If you still don't receive the email, please check your spam folder.
auth.verify-email-change.success-title: Your email address has been changed successfully.
auth.verify-email-change.success-descrip: You can now login to your account.
auth.error.email-invalid: Please enter a valid email address
auth.error.email-password-username-requi: Email, password, and username are required
auth.error.keep-logged-in-required: Keep logged in selection is required
auth.error.password-missing-character: Must contain an uppercase letter, lowercase letter, and a number
auth.error.terms-required: You must accept the Terms of Use
auth.error.google-auth-not-supported: This option is not available for Google accounts
auth.error.password-changed-too-recently: Password was changed too recently, please try again later
auth.form.change-email: Click here to change your e-mail
auth.change-email.success: We have sent a confirmation link to your new address.
auth.change-email.error: Failed to change e-mail. Please try again.
auth.verify-email-change.success: Your e-mail has been changed successfully.
auth.verify-email-change.error: The confirmation link is invalid or has expired.
auth.verify-email.success-title: Your email address has been verified successfully!
auth.verify-email.success-description: You can now login to your account.
app.general.check-inbox: If you don't receive an email within a few minutes, please check your spam folder. If you still can't find the email, please try sending it again.
app.general.upload-image: Click to upload or drag and drop
app.general.register-to-create-recipe: Only registered users can create recipes
app.general.register-to-use-shopping-lis: Only registered users can use the shopping list
app.general.shopping-list-tooltip-anonym: Shopping list is available only for registered users
app.general.search-no-results: The search did not yield any results. Please try again.
app.shopping-list.delete-recipe-shopping: Are you sure you want to delete this recipe from the shopping list?
app.shopping-list.trash-description: Items moved to the trash will be deleted after saving changes.
app.recipe.title: Recipe title
app.recipe.suggest-limit-countdown: You have {{remaining}} attempts left to suggest tags for this recipe
app.recipe.you-can-rate-again-in: You can rate this recipe again in {{seconds}} seconds
app.recipe.create-shopping-list-descript: Click on individual ingredients in the list above to mark those you already have at home. From the remaining ones, you can create a shopping list by clicking the button below.
app.recipe.unsaved-changes-warning: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave this page?
app.recipe.error.flagged-description: The content of this recipe has been flagged as inappropriate. If you believe this is an error, please contact the administrator.
app.recipe.search-suggestions.title: Search suggestions
app.recipe.search-suggestions.empty: Enter a recipe name, ingredient, or instruction
app.recipe.search-suggestions.empty-last: Start browsing recipes and this will show your last viewed
app.recipe.delete-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the recipe {{recipeTitle}}? This action cannot be undone.
app.form.image-cropper.title: Edit image
app.form.image-cropper.description: Edit the image to the desired size.
app.error.not-found.description: The content you are looking for does not exist.
app.error.restricted: You are not authorized to access this page
app.error.restricted.description: This page is for registered users only. Please login to continue.
app.error.restricted.contact-admin: Please contact the administrator if you believe this is an error.
app.error.too-many-requests.description: You are doing this too often. Please try again later.
app.error.invalid-image-format: Please upload a valid image file
app.error.image-size-too-large: Image is too large. Please upload an image that is less than {{maxSize}}MB
app.error.image-dimensions-too-large: Image dimensions are too large. Please upload an image that is less than {{maxWidth}}x{{maxHeight}} px
app.error.conflict: Conflict – this action could not be completed
app.error.infrastructure: Service temporarily unavailable, please try again later
app.error.global.description: The service is temporarily unavailable, please try again later.
app.cookies.modal.title: Cookie settings
app.cookies.modal.description: Manage your cookie preferences below. Essential cookies are always enabled as they are necessary for the website to function properly.
app.cookies.modal.essential-description: Required for the website to function properly
app.cookies.modal.preferences-descriptio: Let us remember your preferred settings
app.cookies.modal.analytics-description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website
app.cookies.modal.marketing-description: Personalize advertisements and measure their performance
app.cookies.banner.title: We value your privacy. Choose which cookies you want to allow. Essential cookies are always enabled as they are necessary for the website to function properly.
app.cookies.error.failed-to-save: We could not save your cookie-consent. Please try again.
app.profile.settings.cookies-description: Here you can manage your cookie preferences.
app.profile.settings.password-link: Click on this link to change your password
auth.logout-all.title: Logout from everywhere?
auth.logout-all.body: This will immediately sign you out on every device. Continue?
auth.logout-all.success: You have been logged out on all devices.
app.cookbook.title: Title
app.cookbook.visibility.public-descripti: Public cookbook will be visible to all users.
app.cookbook.visibility.unlisted-descrip: Cookbook will be available only via link. It will not be visible in your list of cookbooks for other users.
app.cookbook.visibility.private-descript: Private cookbook will not be visible in your list of cookbooks and you will only be able to view its content.
app.cookbook.validation.title-max-length: Title can have a maximum of 140 characters
app.cookbook.validation.description-max-: Description can have a maximum of 1400 characters
app.cookbook.see-more: and {{count}} more recipes... open the cookbook to see all of them
app.cookbook.select-description: Select a cookbook to add the recipe to. Cookbooks cannot contain the same recipe more than once.
app.cookbook.no-cookbooks-title: You don't have any cookbooks yet
app.cookbook.no-cookbooks-description: Create your first cookbook. The recipe will be added automatically.
app.cookbook.create-and-add-success: Cookbook created and recipe added successfully
app.recipe.remove-from-cookbook-confirma: Are you sure you want to remove this recipe from the cookbook?
meta.site.title: Cookhound

meta.too-many-requests.description: You are doing this too often. Please try again later.

meta.restricted.description: This page is for registered users only. Please login to continue.

meta.auth.verify-email-change.descriptio: Confirm your new email address for your Cookhound account.
